row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_DMTOOL.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
:SWITCH &$PLATFORM# :CASE "WINDOWS" ! insert these lines in your script to determine if an error occurred ! @set retcode=%errorlevel% ! @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode !
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar &$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#dm-tool.jar rm CreateDeployPackage -u "&UC4RB_RM_HOST#" ? -un "&UC4RB_RM_USERNAME#" -p "&UC4RB_RM_PASSWORD#" ? -n "&UC4RB_RM_PACKAGE_NAME#" -a "&UC4RB_RM_PACKAGE_APP#" ? -t "&UC4RB_RM_PACKAGE_CTYPE#" -o "&UC4RB_RM_PACKAGE_OWNER#" -f "&UC4RB_RM_PACKAGE_FOLDER#" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
:CASE "UNIX"
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar &$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#dm-tool.jar rm CreateDeployPackage -u "&UC4RB_RM_HOST#" ? -un "&UC4RB_RM_USERNAME#" -p "&UC4RB_RM_PASSWORD#" ? -n "&UC4RB_RM_PACKAGE_NAME#" -a "&UC4RB_RM_PACKAGE_APP#" ? -t "&UC4RB_RM_PACKAGE_CTYPE#" -o "&UC4RB_RM_PACKAGE_OWNER#" -f "&UC4RB_RM_PACKAGE_FOLDER#" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
:OTHER
:ENDSWITCH
